short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension that shows how many and what color is on a web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension makes it easier for developers and designers to see what color is on a certain webpage for accessibility and design consistency.

Features:
＊Simple Install - Works when added to chrome.
＊Easy to Use - 1 click to inspect all colors (images not included) on page in RGBA form.
＊Multiple View - 2 ways of viewing color.
